about_the_game:
Cats are forbidden in Rodentia, Baba disagrees.
Developed by solo dev JT Mitchell.

Step into the purr-fectly chaotic world of Cat Capacity, a whimsical indie game hand-crafted by solo developer JT Mitchell, with a penchant for feline mischief! Embrace your inner crazy cat lady as you embark on a hilarious escapade, navigating the trials and tribulations of keeping your beloved fur babies safe from the prying eyes of your landlord.

In this charmingly quirky indie adventure, you'll embark on a mission to save your beloved feline companions from the clutches of the kingdom's notorious ruler King Uberlort. With each meow echoing danger, you must use all your cunning and wit to outsmart the Anti-Cat King's relentless henchmen and whisk away as many cats as you can to safety.

With its unorthodox game mechanics and quirky art style, Cat Capacity will transport you to a world where magic and mischief collide. Sneak, hop, and hide, to help Baba Yaga stuff as many cats as she can into drawers on her quest to defy the king's anti-cat decree.
Are you ready to embrace your inner Crazy Cat Lady and embark on a purr-fectly charming adventure? Gather your wits, sharpen your claws, and get ready to unleash the ultimate cat-astrophe in Cat Capacity!

Making of gif compilation

-20 levels.
-5 cat types.
-2 modes.
-2 enemy NPC types.
-Dynamic point system.

name: Cat Capacity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is what the game was built with. Let me know if it runs on an older system on twitter @DosGatitosGames or in the steam community page thanks.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embrace your inner crazy cat lady!
